physical_requirements.description: The bowl should be placed on a stable, flat surface to prevent spillage during pouring.
A secure grip on the milk container is required to ensure controlled pouring.
The milk container should be tilted at the right angle to control the flow and avoid overfilling the bowl.
Pour at a steady pace to ensure smooth and precise distribution of milk into the bowl.
Ensure the bowl is positioned directly under the spout of the milk container for accurate pouring.

Senses the weight of the milk container and helps guide the pouring process.
Provides feedback on the position and angle of the container to maintain a steady pour.
The sound of milk flowing helps assess the pour rate and ensures the correct amount is being poured.
